author: David Gilbert, chloe angyal
title: Bangladesh Is on Coronavirus Lockdown, But That Didn't Stop 100,000 People From Attending a Funeral
description: Police were unable to control the crowds and local media reported that very few of those attending the funeral were wearing masks.
content:

 Bangladesh extended its nationwide lockdown last week, only permitting people to leave their homes to buy groceries and medical supplies, and banning gatherings of more than five people.
 But… [+3418 chars]
